item.description:
Something different! Polytechnic ON20 is doing a dinner/music event open to the public. Serving "comfort food" instead of their usually more eccletic fare. Reservations are required. I have reserved a table for 8 in my name "Betsy/Meetup" Cocktails are early, but dinner doesn't start until 7:00pm (must be seated by dinnertime!).

Their description is:

FRIDAY, JANUARY 23, 2009: Join us for cocktails, dinner and "The Whiffenpoofs" (Yale University's 14 member men's a cappella group specializing in amazing harmonies and comedic stylings celebrating their centennial) $45.00 per person includes 3 course dinner and performance!

6:00pm COCKTAILS (Cash Bar)
7:00pm 3 COURSE DINNER
7:30PM PERFORMANCE


Menu based on Mory's - Yale's famous dining club:
Starters: Clam Chowder -or- Iceberg Wedge -or- Welsh Rarebit
Entrees: Fish n Chips -or- Short Ribs -or- Papparadelle Bolognese
Desserts: Chocolate Bread Pudding -or- Jasmine rice pudding -or- Apple Crepes

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: Polytechnic Club 01/23/09 + Whiffenpoofs
